extensionDescription.message: Uploads your large attachments to your OwnCloud and instead inserts a public link into your email.

serverURLDesc.message: Your Personal WebDav file path can be found under Settings in the lower left of the Files screen.

tokenDesc.message: An app token (preferrable) or password. (Generate an OwnCloud app token via User -> Settings -> Security -> App Token)  WARNING: this token is stored insecurely.  NOTE: this will require the OAuth2 plugin on the server.

pathDesc.message: The path where the files are stored in OwnCloud (it must already exist and begin and end with a '/')
